entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rocky Mountain House 07:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -12.0°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 7. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with a few rain showers changing to a few flurries before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
